document_data.edition1: <!-- leave blank if there is only one -->
document_data.Description: ''Red Dragon's Tale: A Lego Adventure'' was written by [[Christopher Perkins]] with art by [[Patricia de Erausquin Llorens]] and [[Alison Titus Hughes]]. It was published on April 1{{st}}, 2024, by [[Wikipedia:The Lego Group|The Lego Group]] as part of the Lego Insider rewards program, as either a free downloadable PDF or a booklet that could be ordered for a number of points, and ties into the [[w:c:brickpedia:21348 Dungeons & Dragons: Red Dragon's Tale|Dungeons & Dragons: Red Dragon's Tale]] Lego set.

* Without D&D Rules
* Character Sheets
